title: 1.5 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a list of at least six movies and rate them out of 5. Make sure the ratings are in decimal values only.
Round the double values into the nearest int using the rounding with casting technique.
[Hint: Refer to the program 1.5.4]
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
